text: Tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga Farisi narɨ, narɨ pɨmɨ aru kavɨrɨmandɨra. Narɨ kuyusɨhɨrɨmbɨhapɨha ŋɨnɨŋ. Narɨ sahi kɨvayɨndu sukɨsɨrambɨ haŋɨnɨŋ kumanzɨpi timutamu tɨŋgɨruramata tamarahata mɨŋgɨyataya Gotɨŋ ŋgundara. Hara narɨ tɨkatɨka kuyundu vana aruru nɨmata haŋɨnɨŋ mitamaraŋa. Krunavundiŋ tɨtɨ vanayɨ taya ŋgatɨŋgɨrutɨŋgɨru vana, sɨhiŋgaha vana, naŋga indarɨmaŋgaramaŋgara vana. Kamataharɨm tɨkatɨkata kuyu aruru haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋahandata, tɨkatɨka kuyu mu haŋɨnɨŋ ndahara mamitamara.
